pages.text: Scalar Utils 5 offers a variety of torches with a stone base, referred to as Stone Torches.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire the Stone Torch.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire the Redstone Stone Torch.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire the Soul Stone Torch.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire the Tiny Stone Torch.

Above is the crafting recipe to acquire the Tiny Soul Stone Torch.
